item.title: Comprehensive species sampling and sophisticated algorithmic approaches refute the monophyly of Arachnida
Tightening the girdle: phylotranscriptomics of Polyplacophora
A congruent topology for deep gastropod relationships
item.description: Check this Twitter thread for a highlight on how snails, limpets and slugs are related to each other. Gastropods are about ~100,000 species on water and land, and the most diverse group of animals in the oceans!
